data.message: Then I moved out and lived with my teenage mama sister and her baby and her boyfriend we just basically we a bunch of teenagers in our own house which is dope af tho but a struggle. Her boyfriend is now her husband and he is the number one coder on google his name is Gregory Johnson and he rapped to eminem one time on the phone when we were teenagers he hard the peroxide hair and everything he embarred of that shit now tho haha havent seen those pictures around... owen  fuckin with me thru  them too I think... I stopped talking to them because of it and they are pretty much my only family
